bibl.title: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, January 3, 1954

div1.p: Nogueira describes a ceremony held in Marianao, Cuba, on the anniversary of Finlay's birthday. Medals were awarded to those involved with the yellow fever experiments and to their families.

div1.head: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, January 3, 1954
div1.opener:
DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA
MEDICO CIRUJANO
MARTI 219, MARIANAO
-------
TELEFONO: B0-7577
Marianao Enero 3 de 1954
Dr Philip Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnessota
U.S.A.
Dear Philip:
div1.p:
Just a few lines to send you greeting and the same time,
give you some news with relationon the doing up to the present moment.

On third of December Finlay's birthday, we held Marianao official
act on Lazear Camp, which I am mailing photos, for you to see what we
did overhere. We had the presence of Lambert who came down Cuba to get
his Finlay's Condecoration, which was given to him on Science Academy
as you can see on the photo together.

Pleasant for me, to inform you, that you were promoted to the Rank
of Commendator for which I congratulate you, and I have your Diploma
in hand, wchich I am sending by airmail.

Also, I must inform you that I forgot to include on last year list
Dr James Carroll, Jr, who has been Condecorated too so that nobody
stay out, without having received the same of that memorable episode.

I am handing Mr Lambert, Mrs Ames Commendator's Medals, which he
will give her, on his return to the United States. I hope this all,
you'd like to know, and now I just begin to treat with the new Health
Ministry, Dr Jose. E. Olivella, to obtain the Medals needed to give
to the persons who, last year received said Condecoration; why, I am
sorry. up to know, they have not received them and hoping with some
luck to resolve all relating with the matter.

Philip write some lines to know something about your life,
and about Mary, and mean while I wish you a merry and happy new year
in 1954.-
div1.closer:
Mith my best whises N Pedro Dr Pedro Nogueira.
Philip: Please send the adress of Dr Carroll Jr and his name
when you write.
Thanks
Pedro
